Module.Content:
<html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
</head>
<body>
    <button onclick="createIframe()">Open it!</button>

    <script>
        function createIframe() {
            
            var win = window.open(); 
          
            var iframe = win.document.createElement('iframe');
            iframe.style.width = "100%";
            iframe.style.height = "100%";
            iframe.style.border = "none";
            win.document.body.style.margin = '0';
            win.document.body.style.height = '100vh';
            iframe.style.margin = '0';

            
            var base64Url = "aHR0cHM6Ly9nYW1pbmctb3BlbnNvY2lhbC5nb29nbGV1c2VyY29udGVudC5jb20vZ2FkZ2V0cy9pZnI/dXJsPWh0dHBzOi8vY2RuLmpzZGVsaXZyLm5ldC9naC9iaWdmaXNoZ2FtaW5nL2JpZ2Zpc2hnYW1pbmdAcmVmcy9oZWFkcy9tYWluL2dnZ2FtZWh1Yi54bWwmY29udGFpbmVyPWln";
           
          
          var decodedUrl = atob(base64Url);
            
          
          iframe.src = decodedUrl;
          
          
            win.document.body.appendChild(iframe);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
